alert.note: Alert for Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 13 at 5:06PM CDT until August 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Elmore, Macon and Tallapoosa. * WHEN...Until 815 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 506 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen over a short period of time. Additional heavy rain is expected from this stationary thunderstorm. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tuskegee, Tallassee, Notasulga, Milstead, Franklin, Reeves Airport, Tallapoosa City, Ware, Claud and Uphapee Creek.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
